DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis PMS disease Age 18 45 year Patients general good health Any follow endocrinological disease : diabetes mellitus , hypo/hyperthyreosis , pituitary tumor . Clearly kidney liver disease , abnormal kidney liver function . Any following gynecological disease : endometriosis , mammary carcinoma , intraductal papilloma , galactorrhea , mammary fibroadenoma .
